attributes.action: Stop police cuts and put more police officers back on our streets
attributes.additional_details: As the police have be forced to cut staff, criminals have been given an open invitation to crime as they know they will most likely get away with it as their isn’t enough resources and manpower to catch criminals out. Areas such as London and Home Counties are being hit hard by crime and it isn’t fair to the people who work hard for what they got. Motorcycle gangs are becoming More popular as they know they an make a quick get away. Put more officers on our streets with unmarked police bikes to stop these people.
attributes.background: Since our government has forced police services across the U.K. to cut their staff crime has shot up with vehicle thefts, burglaries, assaults and much more becoming more of a major issue especially in the London area and home country’s
